## Git.list() method

Get a list of all the repositories

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
list(callback: (error: Error | undefined, repos?: string[]) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (error: Error | undefined, repos?: string\[]) => void | function to be called when repositories have been found <code>function(error, repos)</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
